items.sentence: Tom noticed Mary and went over to talk to her.
I think it\'s time for me to close the window.
I think it\'s time for me to consult a doctor.
I think it\'s time for me to consult a lawyer.
Tom placed the gifts under the Christmas tree.
Tom plans to stay here until it stops raining.
Tom plays the xylophone better than Mary does.
Tom pointed out some mistakes that I had made.
Tom should have gone to the dentist yesterday.
Tom showed Mary several pictures of his house.
Tom started playing golf when he was thirteen.
Let\'s see if we can figure out what happened.
Let\'s share this money between the two of us.
Let\'s sit at one of the tables near the back.
Let\'s take a look at this from another angle.
I think you should know that I can\'t do that.
I was absent from school because I had a cold.
I was afraid that I might be late for the bus.
I was an accountant before I became a teacher.
Hey, don\'t blame me. I\'m just the messenger.
